title: Please Help Riot or players
body: My setting in game dont keep like i need to chnage them everytime i start a game they just dont keep in there cna someone help me please? It's SO annoying

replies.body:
It sounds like a corruption with your config is failing to save and sync up to our servers.  Try resetting your config settings to fix this.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that works for you!
Thanks a lot man ! it worked
